categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens actors

nodes.text: Tosin Cole (born July 23, 1992) is an English actor who portrayed Bastian in Star Wars Episode VII The Force Awakens. He is also known for his roles as Neil Cooper on the soap opera Hollyoaks and Sol Levi on the Internet soap opera EastEnders: E20. Most recently, Cole has gained attention for his portrayal of Ryan Sinclair in the eleventh and twelfth series of the long-running science fiction television show Doctor Who.
